5. The Silence of the Lambs (1991) - A psychological thriller about an FBI agent (played by Jodie Foster) who seeks the help of a serial killer (played by Anthony Hopkins) to catch another serial killer.
6. Misery (1990) - A psychological thriller about a writer who is held captive by his "number one fan" (played by Kathy Bates), who will stop at nothing to make him write a new book featuring her favorite character.

I hope you find these recommendations helpful and enjoy watching some of these movies! Let me know if you have any other preferences or if there's anything else I can help you with.
